projectGridLines.title: DevOps
projectGridLines.description:
Job Duties and Responsibilities:

? Assist in the development and maintenance of CI/CD pipelines to streamline

deployment, testing, and operational processes.

? Collaborate within the TechOps team to implement and manage infrastructure as code

using tools like Terraform or Ansible.

? Write and maintain Python scripts for automation tasks related to system administration

and deployment.

? Contribute to automating the data cloning process, ensuring efficient and consistent data

replication across environments.

? Monitor system performance, troubleshoot issues within cloud environments, and

implement solutions to improve reliability and efficiency.

? Support the optimization and automation of Linux-based tasks, gaining experience in

reducing manual work and enhancing system performance

? Document configurations, procedures, and best practices for system administration,

automation tasks, and cloud infrastructure management.

Skills You Must Have:

? Currently pursuing a Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Information

Technology, or a related field.

? Solid understanding of Linux/Unix systems, Python and shell scripting.

? Familiarity with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.

? Understanding of version control systems (e.g., Git).

? Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

? Excellent communication and teamwork abilities.

? Eagerness to learn and adapt in a fast-paced environment.

? Attention to detail and a proactive attitude towards identifying and resolving issues.

Skills That Are Nice to Have:

? Knowledge of automation tools and frameworks (e.g., Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes) is a

plus.

? Experience with infrastructure as code tools like Terraform or Ansible.

? Familiarity with monitoring tools such as Prometheus or Grafana.

Benefits of interning @Reltio

? Gain practical experience in DevOps and Cloud Platform engineering.

? Opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies and tools.

? Mentorship from experienced professionals in the field.

? Collaborative and inclusive work environment.

? Potential for future career opportunities at Reltio.
